mapper.select: SELECT a.id, b.name AS buildingName, d.name AS dormitoryName, s.name AS studentName, a.reason, da.name AS dormitoryAdminName, a.create_date AS createDate FROM dormitory d, student s, building b, absent a, dormitory_admin da WHERE d.id = a.dormitory_id AND s.id = a.student_id AND b.id = a.building_id AND da.id = a.dormitory_admin_id;

SELECT a.id, b.name AS buildingName, d.name AS dormitoryName, s.name AS studentName, a.reason, da.name AS dormitoryAdminName, a.create_date AS createDate FROM dormitory d, student s, building b, absent a, dormitory_admin da WHERE d.id = a.dormitory_id AND s.id = a.student_id AND b.id = a.building_id AND da.id = a.dormitory_admin_id AND b.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%');

SELECT a.id, b.name AS buildingName, d.name AS dormitoryName, s.name AS studentName, a.reason, da.name AS dormitoryAdminName, a.create_date AS createDate FROM dormitory d, student s, building b, absent a, dormitory_admin da WHERE d.id = a.dormitory_id AND s.id = a.student_id AND b.id = a.building_id AND da.id = a.dormitory_admin_id AND d.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{value}, '%');
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO absent (building_id, dormitory_id, student_id, dormitory_admin_id, create_date, reason) VALUES (#{buildingId}, #{dormitoryId}, #{studentId}, #{dormitoryAdminId}, #{createDate}, #{reason});
